sentences.en: ( It is the question once again of polygenesis versus diffusion from a single origin. )
sentences.cn: ( 再次涉及到不同的游戏发展自同一源头的问题. )

sentences.en: A diffusion method for the preparation of ferrous oxalate in a gel system was presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种在凝胶体系中用扩散法制备草酸亚铁的结晶方法。

sentences.en: A plastic membrane serves as selective diffusion barrier.
sentences.cn: 一层塑料薄膜起着选择性渗透屏障的作用.

sentences.en: Certain fishes have a swim bladder which aids in diffusion of gases.
sentences.cn: 有些鱼有鳔,它有助于散布气体.

sentences.en: Clouds cause the diffusion of light from the sun.

sentences.cn: 散布，如消息的传开；扩散。

sentences.en: For some viruses the encounter with a surface is probable diffusion - limited.
sentences.cn: 有些病毒与表面接触可能受到扩散的限制.

sentences.en: Molecular diffusion also occurs in liquids and solids.
sentences.cn: 分子扩散同样也会在液体和固体中发生。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, temperature has a very significant effect on the rate of diffusion.
sentences.cn: 但是温度对扩散速度却有非常大的影响.

sentences.en: The crack grouting diffusion radius is the basic gist of the grouting construction design and grouting craftwork control.
sentences.cn: 灌浆扩散半径是进行灌浆结构设计和灌浆工艺流程控制的基本依据。

sentences.en: The diffusion process seems to be accelerating.
sentences.cn: 传播过程看来正在加速.

sentences.en: The effect of the diffusion capacitance can be troublesome.
The invention of printing helped the diffusion of learning.
sentences.cn: 印刷术的发明有助于知识的传播.

sentences.en: The invention of the printing press announced the diffusion of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 印刷术的发明预示着知识的传播.

sentences.en: There are data on the rates of diffusion of molecules.
sentences.cn: 有关于分子扩散速度的数据。

sentences.en: This phenomenon , peculiar to the two - dimensional wave motion, is sometimes called diffusion.
sentences.cn: 二维波所特有的这种现象, 有时叫做弥散现象.

sentences.en: This regime is termed mass transport or diffusion limited.
sentences.cn: 这种方式被称作质量输送或扩散控制.

sentences.en: To understand that you have core power distribution that you can calculate using diffusion theory but that core power distribution creates a flux.
sentences.cn: 理解你的核心动力分布,你能计算使用扩散理论,但是核心动力分布创造了一个流量。

sentences.en: Traditional systems have used oil diffusion pumps.
sentences.cn: 常规的系统使用油扩散泵.

words.tran_cn: 普及的；散布性的；冗长的
散布，传播（diffuse的过去分词）；使分散

phrases.tran_cn: 扩散势垒区；扩散式叠层
扩散压合；扩散接合；扩散粘结
